typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcUsers
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimUser
SrcUsers, FilterOnlyLastRow join({_Id} == UserSk,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinDimUser
SrcDimUser filter(isNull(EndDate)) ~> FilterOnlyLastRow
DrvDateCols split(!isNull(UserId) && {_Location} != Location,
	disjoint: false) ~> CsRows@(SCD2Location, Upsert)
JoinDimUser derive(NewStartDate = currentUTC(),
		NewEndDate = currentUTC()) ~> DrvDateCols
CsRows@SCD2Location alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterUpdateOldRow
CsRows@Upsert alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
AlterUpdateOldRow sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserId'],
	mapColumn(
		UserId,
		EndDate = NewEndDate
	)) ~> DestUpdateOldRows
AlterUpsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['{_Id}'],
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = {_Id},
		AccountId = {_AccountId},
		DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		Location = {_Location},
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestUpsert
CsRows@SCD2Location sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = {_Id},
		AccountId = {_AccountId},
		DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		Location = {_Location},
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestNewHistoricalRow
